sentences.sContent: I go to the gym as often as I can.
sentences.sCn: 我一有空就去健身房健身。

sentences.sContent: ...But chances are it won’t have much impact on the human tendency to resolve to get to the gym more and avoid chocolate cake when the clock strikes midnight on December 31...
...I generally go to the gym or go for a run...

trans.tranOther: a special building or room that has equipment for doing physical exercise
